item.description:
This event will focus on abstract/thinking games.  These kinds of games challenge the parts of your brain involved in identifying patterns, spatial reasoning, visual perception and problem solving.  So if you like getting your brain stimulated, this event is for you. :-)

Some examples of abstract games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • Blokus
  • Ticket to Ride
  • Set
  • Blockers
  • Chess
  • Ingenious
  • Carcassonne
  • Hive
  • Kingdom Builder

 

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about this genre, this event will be for you.  We welcome new players with open arms.

We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night so please bring your favorites. If necessary, we will divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences.

---

No real curfew but the host usually loses focus and energy around 2am. ;-)

---

About the location:  
This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Abstract/Thinking Game Night in Danvers
